repos.name: topizzy
repos.description: Topizzy is a web3 fintech tool built for USDC holders who want to use their crypto in everyday life. Instead of converting to fiat and then spending, Topizzy lets you top-up mobile airtime using USDC directly, Topizzy opens a bridge between digital assets and real‚Äêworld utility.

repos.name: polkaShield
repos.description: PolkaShield is a resilient, tamper-proof access-control layer for Web2 applications.   It stores roles, permissions, and audit logs on a Polkadot-based custom blockchain.  Users authenticate with wallet signatures.   Web2 apps verify access via a simple REST API.

repos.name: yieldRelay
repos.description: YieldRelay is a RealFi-native yield router on Mantle that turns preserved capital into recurring funding by directing only generated yield to compliant, allowlisted beneficiaries.
